content.raw:
Ok, splitting up of the pull request is much better now. Phew, that was a bit [tricky](https://bitbucket.org/snippets/cbillington/eaGpbp)

Testers/reviewers, this is the one to give attention to now. Thanks @PhyNerd for reporting on the testing you've done, it would be good to verify no regressions in one of the Monash labs if @rpanderson or @shjohnst are up to it.

I will merge on Monday June 18th if there are no further comments or concerns.
